name: Around & Back
description:
Made for the Kenney Jam 2020

* Menu does not use the mouse. Use up an down arrows to move and enter or space to select :)

I didn't plan to do this jam but I was playing with making a circle pong game when the theme of Cursed gave me the idea that the paddle could be cursed to shrink when it hits the ball. So 12 hours later here is the game. 

The game is admittedly light on art but all assets other than fonts and music  are made by Kenney (art and sound). 
https://kenney.nl/assets

Score Font by John Watson
https://jotson.itch.io/gravity-pixel-font
